content.question: Which of the following best explains the historical significance of views such as those expressed in the passage?

choices.label: They show that many political leaders used the economic challenges of the Great Depression to justify implementing repressive policies.
They show that many states responded to the Great Depression by using race-based ideologies to mobilize economic resources.
They show that, in response to the disruptions of the Great Depression, many political leaders saw it as their duty to take an active role in guiding economic life.
They show that, in response to the disruptions of the Great Depression, some states reaffirmed their commitment to pursuing liberal economic policies.

content.answer: They show that, in response to the disruptions of the Great Depression, many political leaders saw it as their duty to take an active role in guiding economic life.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
